name: 24hrAssistant
overview:
24hrAssistant is an online appointment scheduling software that allows customers to book an appointment anywhere, anytime.

We know that successful professionals are often on the go. We want to make sure you know about appointments no matter where you are. This is why 24hrAssistant is also available on your mobile phone. A french version of our program is also coming soon.

The phone is ringing, the pen just ran out of ink, the appointment book just fell into the garbage can and you can’t reach it while you’re still talking to the customer. Why are so many appointment-based businesses still booking clients the same way their grandparents did fifty years ago, with pen and paper?

An online booking system makes life so much simpler. It frees up your time by:

  • Allowing customers to request their own appointments
  • Reduces voicemail and hang-ups
  • Allows staff to check schedules from home and on-the-go
  • Increases traffic to your website and promotes your services

Empower your staff and your clients with 24hrAssistant. Our online booking appointment system keeps your business open long after you’ve hung the closed sign on the front door.
